mapper.insert: insert into award_team ( award_id, user_id, user_role, contribution ) values ( #{award_id}, #{user_id}, #{user_role}, #{contribution} )
mapper.select: SELECT u.user_name name,u.department_id department_id, t.user_role user_role, t.contribution contribution FROM user u, award a, award_team t WHERE a.award_id = #{award_id} and a.award_id = t.award_id and t.user_id = u.user_id
